block.p: BLACHMAN-Julius. Of Brooklyn, NY, on July 26, 2000, age 88. Beloved husband of the late Toni Blachman. Dear father of Paul and the late Marvin Blachman. Adored grandfather of Joshua, Andrew, Jessica and Jeremy. Cherished brother of Sara. Funeral service took place July 27. Memorial contributions may be made to the Madison Jewish Center, 2989 Nostrand Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11229.
